mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Tra_Img (travel_id, img_id, img_original_file, img_stored_file) VALUES (#{travel_id}, Tra_Img_SEQ.nextval, #{img_original_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img_stored_file})
mapper.select: SELECT TRAVEL_ID, IMG_ID, IMG_STORED_FILE, IMG_ORIGINAL_FILE FROM Tra_Img WHERE travel_id = #{travel_id} ORDER BY IMG_ID DESC
